fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Capital Markets Union, MiFID II, UCITS, AIFMD, Data Protection, CCP Recovery & Resolution, EMIR, Shareholders Rights Directive, ESG & Corporate Governance, Brexit
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Fidelity International is a member of several trade associations for the investment management industry, including EFAMA, the Investment Association, BVI, ALFI and Irish Funds.
goals__remit:
Fidelity International was established in 1969 and provides asset management services to investors all over the world outside the US. We offer a wide range of funds to investors and currently manage approximately €300 bn for private individuals and institutions. 
 
Working with investors, financial advisers and distributors around the world, we provide easy access to our investment funds and products to help people achieve their medium- to long-term investment and savings goals.
